Wikipedia contains 5,816,996 pages.
There are a total of 460,150,504 links between Wikipedia pages.
8,619,787 Wikipedia pages are actually just redirects to other pages.
"List of current U.S. state legislators" is the Wikipedia page with the highest number of outgoing links (8,280).
"List of people from Illinois" is the Wikipedia page with the second highest number of outgoing links (8,077).
"List of least concern birds" is the Wikipedia page with the third highest number of outgoing links (7,897).
"List of stage names" is the Wikipedia page with the fourth highest number of outgoing links (6,701).
"List of film director and actor collaborations" is the Wikipedia page with the fifth highest number of outgoing links (6,696).
"Geographic coordinate system" is the most linked to page on Wikipedia (1,085,687 incoming links).
"International Standard Book Number" is the second most linked to page on Wikipedia (1,055,992 incoming links).
"Virtual International Authority File" is the third most linked to page on Wikipedia (530,101 incoming links).
"WorldCat" is the fourth most linked to page on Wikipedia (513,847 incoming links).
"United States" is the fifth most linked to page on Wikipedia (473,631 incoming links).
The first Wikipedia page title in alphabetical order is "!!".
The last Wikipedia page title in alphabetical order is "ùïä".
338 Wikipedia pages (0.006% of all pages) have no incoming or outgoing links.
There are only 1,283 Wikipedia pages (0.02% of all pages) which link to no other pages.
There are 312,447 Wikipedia pages (5.37% of all pages) which are not linked to from any other page.

Only 17 Wikipedia page titles begin with an exclamation mark, one of which is "!O!ung_language".
8,986 Wikipedia pages (0.15%) have a title which contains an exclamation mark.
Only 17 Wikipedia page titles begin with a question mark, one of which is "?:_A_Question_Mark".
3,742 Wikipedia pages (0.06%) have a title which contains a question mark.
5,058,698 Wikipedia pages (87.0%) have a title which contains a space.
758,298 Wikipedia pages (13.0%) have a title which does not contain a space.
A single or double quotation mark can be found in 170,439 Wikipedia page titles (2.93% of all page titles), leading to countless parsing issues while creating this.

The "List of lists of lists" page is a list of pages that are lists of list pages on the English Wikipedia.
The "Order of magnitude" page lists "yocto-" (10^-24) and "yotta-" (10^24) as the smallest and largest magnitude prefixes.
The "Names of large numbers" page contains words like "googol" (10^100) and "millinillion" (10^3003).
An "Illegal prime" is a prime number that represents information whose possession or distribution is forbidden in some legal jurisdictions.
